entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ``ILGenerator`` does not properly handle function pointers #111003
  • Adding multiple HttpClients with same Interface results in conflicting configurations #110996
  • .net8 String.IndexOf crash #110994
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Internal.HostTests.HostLifetimeOnStartedCanBeCancelled #110988
    10.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Reflecting to find nullability of a generic return type is unreasonably complicated #110971
  • Unobserved ObjectDisposedException when reading HTTPS stream #110998

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Add TSPLIB dump capabilities to block layout #111005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Experimental PR to compare TP #111004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unused packageindex infra #111002
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] [llvm-aot] Fixed storing Vector3 into memory #111000
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix conflicting HttpClient configs #110999
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution

Merged

  • [S390x] Fix endian bug in minipal #110985
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix code style in ProductVersionInfoGenerator.cs #110997
    needs-area-label
  • Use correct product version in SPC in servicing #110980
    area-System.Runtime

Updated

  • Add lock in ValidateName #110780
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Observe any exception on HTTP connection scavenge. #110982
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Build the "in build" crossgen2 into a pack that we can use within the VMR #110676
    area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Fix NativeAOT ThunksPool thunk data block size handling." #110983
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
